title: Pile Ou Face = Heads or Tails
abstract: Note: Adapted from 'Suivez le veuf/Baroni' by Alfred Harris.
description: Edouard Morlaix's wife dies after falling through a window. Inspector Baroni is convinced she was pushed by Morlaix who wanted to be free to run away with his mistress. Baroni starts harrassing Morlaix in the hope to have him break down and admit to the murder.  Credits: Producer, Georges Cravenne ; director, Robert Enrico ; writers, Robert Enrico, Michel Audiard, Marcel Jullian ; photography, Didier Tarot ; music, Lino Leonardi. Cast: Philippe Noiret, Michel Serrault, Dorothee, Pierre Arditi, Andre Falcon, Fred Personne, Jean Desailly.
